title: During a Call,  How Can I Answer or Reject a New Incoming Call?
answer: In this case, you need to activate the call waiting service. After the call waiting service is activated, if there is a new incoming call when you are on another call, you can hear the alert tone. Then, you can press the left soft key or the answer key to answer the new incoming call and hold the ongoing call, or press the end key to continue the ongoing call and reject the new incoming call.
